Gannett Local Workshop
April.SanMarco@gannett.com
how are your customers using social media?
G/O Digital is holding a SEO/SEM Social Media Workshop for business experts, and would Love for you to attend!
60 MIN CRASH COURSE IN SOCIAL MEDIA
Social Media 101 Successful Case Studies Discover Proven Strategies Learn Tested Techniques Generate New Customers
CLASS OUTLINE
What is Social Media? What does the Fortune 100 know that I don't? Why is it so important for my business? How do I use social media to create new customers? How do I get started?
Use the links below to accept our invite and register for the time that best fits your schedule. (click on the date/time that you wish to attend)
